welcome.setupIntro: Letz make ur gadget all shiny in jus' few stepz!
welcome.warning: Uh-oh! Dis pre-releaz, so might hav buggoes!

wizard.title: Magical Updatey Timez!
wizard.description: Wez move ur stuff safe an soundz! Clicky nexty, k?

access.title: Eazy-peazy Accessy!
access.description: Make ur gadget feelz puurfect fur u!

colors.title: Pick ur purr-fav colorz!
colors.description: Chooz da colory dat makz u happiez!

contacts.title: Contacts
contacts.description: Access to contacts is needed to display your contacts live tile.

photos.title: Photos

notifications.title: Notifications
notifications.description: Access to notifications is needed to display your notifications live tile.

finish.title: All done! Time to Groovy-groove!
